Posts.EditableText: I updated the age of my profile. How long until the changes take place?
Posts.HTML: I updated the age of my profile. How long until the changes take place?

Posts.EditableText: Some people have reported that if they change their age, they don't gain (or lose) access to adult games until they log off and sign in again. Others have said they also need to restart the browser and/or clear cookies; but it seems that doesn't apply to everyone.
Posts.HTML: Some people have reported that if they change their age, they don't gain (or lose) access to adult games until they log off and sign in again. Others have said they also need to restart the browser and/or clear cookies; but it seems that doesn't apply to everyone.
